summary: Provides integration test suites for the IP‑Adapter component within Stable Diffusion and Stable Diffusion XL pipelines, covering image‑to‑image, inpainting, text‑to‑image, multi‑prompt, face‑ID handling, CPU offload, and proper model unloading, along with reusable utilities for dummy data and image processing.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the IP‑Adapter functionality across various diffusion pipelines before deployment, supporting quality assurance and regression testing for image generation features.
